content:
From: Tobias Nipkow <nipkow@in.tum.de>
A Case Study in Basic Algebra
Clemens Ballarin

The focus of this case study is re-use in abstract algebra. It contains
locale-based formalisations of selected parts of set, group and ring theory from
Jacobson's Basic Algebra leading to the respective fundamental homomorphism
theorems. The study is not intended as a library base for abstract algebra. It
rather explores an approach towards abstract algebra in Isabelle.

https://www.isa-afp.org/entries/Jacobson_Basic_Algebra.html

Enjoy!
smime.p7s
